articles.author: Lorenzo Ciotti
articles.title: US Open: Rafael Nadal's gesture left the crowd speechless - Tennis World USA
articles.description: Nadal, in the third set with the American at 5-3 in, gave up in the middle of a game to play a point that was practically lost, turning his back to court and opponent and going to his towel, leaving the crowd speechless
articles.content: Rafael Nadal was eliminated in the fourth round of the US Open 2022 by a great performance by young US star Frances Tiafoe, winner in 4 sets. However, a detail of the match has not escaped the camera… [+2173 chars]
